Formerly Sendinblue, is a SaaS solution: Formerly Sendinblue, is a SaaS solution for relationship marketing
Create or update an existing contact: Create or update an existing contact
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Make a custom API call to a specific endpoint
Email address of the user. Mandatory if: Email address of the user. Mandatory if "SMS" field is not passed in "attributes" parameter. Mobile Number in SMS field should be passed with proper country code. For example: {"SMS":"+91xxxxxxxxxx"} or {"SMS":"0091xxxxxxxxxx"}
Pass your own Id to create a contact.
Pass the set of attributes and their val:
Pass the set of attributes and their values. The attribute's parameter should be passed in capital letter while creating a contact. These attributes must be present in your SendinBlue account. For eg:
        {"FNAME":"Elly", "LNAME":"Roger"}
Set this field to blacklist the contact: Set this field to blacklist the contact for emails (emailBlacklisted = true)
Set this field to blacklist the contact for SMS (smsBlacklisted = true)
Ids of the lists to add the contact to.
transactional email forbidden sender for: transactional email forbidden sender for contact. Use only for email Contact ( only available if updateEnabled = true )
Authorization headers are injected autom: Authorization headers are injected automatically from your connection.
